Class oracle.html.Container 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index  OWS Table of Contents

Class oracle.html.Container 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Container
public class Container
extends Object
implements IHtmlItem

Description:

Container is a type-safe container class for Items.
It allows the client to construct custom paraeterized classes for component based dynamic page construction.
Note that a Container is not an Item.

Instructions:

Use this class whenever you want to create custom container components.

Example: 

// Create a new Container object
Container container = new Container();
// Add a SimpleItem and a TextArea to the container
container.addItem(new Simpleitem("How are you?").setBold())
         .addItem(new TextArea("response", 30, 10));
// Add the container to the body object (assuming it's been created)
body.addItem(container);

See Also:
Vector, IHtmlItem, CompoundItem

setItemAt 
  public synchronized Container setItemAt(IHtmlItem item,

Sets an item at position given by index.
The previous item at that position is discarded.
Parameters:
item - what the item is to be set to.
index - the specified position
